name: Gemnote
headline: Gemnote is the easiest way to design, create and send custom products.
description: Gemnote creates custom merch, swag and gifts for the modern business. Our expert team helps you curate, source, warehouse, fulfill and ship your branded merchandise and company swag, so you don't have to lift a finger. Our clients love our full-service platform and they are some of the biggest companies in the world, including Airbnb, Google, Meta, Slack, Netflix and more.
generated_description:
Gemnote is on a mission to simplify the process of designing, creating, and sending custom merchandise—from branded swag to thoughtful corporate gifts—tailored for modern businesses. Founded in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S15, the company operates out of San Leandro, California, with a dedicated team of around 40 employees.

When it launched, Gemnote focused on producing custom merch and gifts for some of the most recognizable companies in the world, including Airbnb, Google, Meta, and Netflix. Their appeal lies in an intuitive, full-service platform that streamlines every step of the merchandising process. This involves curating product selections, sourcing materials, warehousing, fulfillment, and shipping, all without clients needing to lift a finger.

Their services encompass a broad range of capabilities:
1. **Design + Development**: Collaborate on custom designs that resonate with your brand's identity.
2. **Sourcing + Production**: Ensure high-quality materials and production values that meet your standards.
3. **Kitting + Warehousing**: Safely store and prepare your merchandise for delivery.
4. **Sustainability**: Focus on eco-friendly practices, which today’s brands increasingly prioritize.

Gemnote offers software solutions for managing swag, redemption pages, e-commerce stores, and integration with Shopify. They cater to various needs—from employee swag and new hire kits to conference merchandise and influencer boxes.

They also maintain strong ties with notable brands and influencers, showcasing their work prominently to build trust and credibility. This positions Gemnote as not just another e-commerce platform but a partner in enhancing brand visibility and engagement through custom products.

Curious about the latest trends or looking to dive into custom merchandise? Check out their latest offerings, including a 2024 Holiday Gift Guide available for download on their [website](http://gemnote.com).
